name: Dying Waters
description:
Dying Waters is an underwater serious game played from a first & third person perspective.
  • An Underwater Adventure - Explore a section of the Pacific Ocean full of colourful sealife.
  • A Serious Game - Pick up garbage on the ocean floor and gain useful in-game upgrades and rewards.
  • Dangers - Don't get too cozy staring at the colourful schools of fish! Predators based on real sealife lurk in the world, so stay alert.

Dying Waters is still in it's very early stages. The following executable will only work on the Microsoft Windows & MacOS platform. 

After playing Dying Waters at it's current state if you could fill out a feedback form to help us further improve and develop our game that would be greatly appreciated! 

Linked here -> Dying Waters Feedback Form
